properties.media:imagetext:
May
Eighteenth,
2 7.
W. HI. Howard Estate Co.,
Sharon Blag.,
San Francisco.
Gentlemen:
The City of San Francisco for some time past has been
endeavoring to secure a suitable, tract of land for municipal air
port purposes.
We had under investigation sites at South San Francisco,
millbrae, South of San Mateo and lands under water at San Mateo
Point easterly of your property.
We found that it would be
impracticable to select a permanent site until we had gathered.
sufficient data in regar the fog and wind conditions, as this
data is not available at the present time.
We finally leased from the Mills Estate a temporary field
for a perlod of three years, with the privilege of extension of an
additional. two years.
It is our idea to establish small meteorological stations
on or near sites under contemplation, and to ascertain the fog and
wind conditions over a period of twelve months.
The work will
in charge of men assigned to us by the United States Weather Bureau.
We contemplate the construction of the necessary building immediately
and the perlod of observation would extend from July 1, 1927 to June
30
1928. We are desirous of securing permission from
to locate one of these stations on the
your Company
levee, as shown on the
accompanying may marked file I-7770, and would appreciate very much
securing permission from your Company.
could
Permission, of course,
be made revocable on thirty days! notice in the event of the
sale of the property, and we would remove from your property the
building when we vacated the same.
I am also enclosing may marked file 1-7732, giving full
details of the location and construction work.
to us
Than that con 1" advanoe for any courtesies you may extend
Very truly yours,
JJP: KH
RICHT OF WAY AGENT.
250 015. 810 3035
